alert.note: Alert for Central and Southern Valley; Daniels; Northern Valley (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 11 at 5:45PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Daniels and northern Valley Counties through 645 PM MDT... At 545 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over St. Marie, or 12 miles north of Glasgow, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Opheim, Richland, Tampico, St. Marie, Peerless, Vandalia, West Fork, Baylor, Glentana and Larslan. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for northeastern Montana.

area.areaDesc: Central and Southern Valley; Daniels; Northern Valley
